description: Aspose.Tasks for .NET is a .NET Project management component that enables .NET applications to not only read and manipulate Microsoft Project documents in MPP and XML formats but to also write Microsoft Project documents in MPP or Project XML format - all without using Microsoft Project.
releaseNotes:
Bugs
TASKS-33456
Resource information cannot be read from MPP
TASKS-33463
Cannot read/write Resource.BookingType field in mpp 2003 format.
TASKS-33464
Cannot write Task.CanLevelingSplit, Task.IsLevelAssignments, Task.Contact fields in mpp 2003 format.
TASKS-33465
Cannot set flag attribute to resource.
TASKS-33467
MSP cannot read written Resource.Number2 attribute in 2010 mpp and Resource.Text11, Resource.Text12, Resource.Text13 attributes in 2013 mpp formats.
TASKS-33468
MSP cannot read written Task.Text6 -Text9 and Finish10 attributes in 2013 mpp formats.
TASKS-33470
Cannot read written Task.Hyperlink in mpp 2010-2013.

 
Enhancement
TASKS-33447
Set default properties of a Project when created from scratch
New Features
TASKS-33126
[Project to Excel] Export project as Excel sheet
TASKS-33417
Save project data to CSV (comma delimited) format.
TASKS-33451
Save project data to text format.
TASKS-33455
Save project data as a template (mpt).
summary: Aspose.Tasks for .NET is a component to work with Project files
title: Aspose.Tasks for .NET
